channel.title: Help, this command for linux .sh's [for my client]
channel.description:
guys this is the start of my .sh for my new client for linux:
[code] # Endar Main Startup, 100% by Goat Spirit. # This is the code below XD
cd 'files' echo ==============================
echo Endar - Linux Version
echo ===
echo Made by Goat Spirit
echo ===
echo goat_spirit@hotmail.com
echo ==============================
#first part of code ^^^ #gotta add a pause sometimer later
menu() { echo Type 1 to start Endar. echo Type 2 to start the Endar Updater. echo Type 3 to start the Website Stealer. echo Type 4 to view info. echo Type 5 to exit. echo ============================== echo Your choice? } [/code]
i need help at this part, right after this: [code] echo goat_spirit@hotmail.com
echo ============================== [/code]
i need some function that will goto menu(),
like in windows u type
[code] echo goat_spirit@hotmail.com
echo ============================== goto menu
:menu echo bla blah [/code]
any1 help??

item.title: Help, this command for linux .sh's [for my client]
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

guys this is the start of my .sh for my new client for linux:

# Endar Main Startup, 100% by Goat Spirit.
# This is the code below XD

cd 'files'
echo ==============================

echo Endar - Linux Version

echo ===

echo Made by Goat Spirit

echo ===

echo goat_spirit@hotmail.com

echo ==============================

#first part of code ^^^
#gotta add a pause sometimer later

menu() {
	echo Type 1 to start Endar.
	echo Type 2 to start the Endar Updater.
	echo Type 3 to start the Website Stealer.
	echo Type 4 to view info.
	echo Type 5 to exit.
	echo ==============================
	echo Your choice?
	}

i need help at this part, right after this:

echo goat_spirit@hotmail.com

echo ==============================

i need some function that will goto menu(),

like in windows u type

echo goat_spirit@hotmail.com

echo ==============================
goto menu

:menu
echo bla blah

any1 help??

Read full topic
